entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
